metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4611 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in mm/mempolicy.c in the memory managementsubsystem in the Linux Kernel. This issue is caused by a race betweenmbind() and VMA-locked page fault, and may allow a local attacker to crashthe system or lead to a kernel information leak.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
